items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know who to invite to his birthday party.
Tom didn\'t want to kiss Mary, but she wanted him to.
I doubt that Tom will tell Mary what really happened.
Tom used to bring me here to swim when I was younger.
Tom walked over to the sink and turned on the faucet.
Neither Tom nor Mary is very good at speaking French.
Tom is always threatening to quit, but he never does.
Tom is going to ask Mary if she can help us tomorrow.
I\'m fairly certain that Tom will pass today\'s exam.
Have you ever pretended to be sick when you weren\'t?
